field.controlledRegex: |Set 1 Instapset 2;3-2;5 jaar|Set 2 Instapset 2;6-2;11 jaar|Set 3 Instapset 3;0-3;11 jaar|Set 4 Instapset 4;0-4;5 jaar|Set 5 Instapset 4;6-5;5 jaar|Set 6 Instapset 5;6-6;5 jaar|Set 7 Instapset 6;6-7;11 jaar|Set 8 Instapset 8;0-9;11 jaar|Set 9 Instapset 10;0-10;11 jaar|Set 10 Instapset 11;0 - 13;11 jaar

htmlText.featureText:
Toestemmingsverklaring voor deelname aan het onderzoek:

Ik stem geheel vrijwillig in met deelname aan dit onderzoek.

Beste deelnemer,
Bedankt dat je mee wilt doen aan dit onderzoek!
When a dateOfBirth is entered the Instapset dropdown will jump to the age group specified in the daysThresholds attribute. This dropdown can then be editied as required.
The restulting value of Instapset can then be used in the following presenter to jump to the relevant section of the experiment.
When Opleidingsniveau is equal to anders the extra field educationOther will be shown.

htmlText.featureText:
Instructies Deel 2:

Type het juiste antwoord in de textbox.
A get parameter must be provided on the URL, eg:
stimuliC provided
stimuliC not provided
stimuliN provided
stimuliN not provided
Please make sure that the accent is correctly displayed on this screen: café

This demonstration screen requires the preserveLastState=false in the Experiment element.
Keys to navigate the stimuli are p, r, n and m.
This demonstration screen allows the user to press enter in the text box to go to the next stimulus.
In this example at least two letters and only the wetuiopasfghknm letters can be typed.

stimulusFreeText.featureText: Sorry, dit teken is niet toegestaan in de Fantasietaal.

htmlText.featureText: This demonstration screen shows buttons depending on a given stimulus existing at an offset.

Dit is het einde van het experiment.
Hartelijk dank voor jouw deelname!
Het bovenstaande nummer is het bewijs dat je het experiment heeft voltooid

plainText.featureText: Geen verbinding met de server. Controleer alstublieft uw internetverbinding en probeer het opnieuw.

htmlTokenText.featureText: Your invitation code has been received and is:

htmlText.featureText:
Your invitation code has not been found or is less that three characters long.
Please provide this code as a URL GET parameter (?invitation_code=[yourcode]) and reload this page.
A "validated_uuid" has been found and it must match the provided "uuid".
The "validated_uuid" does match "uuid" and you can continue.
The "validated_uuid" does NOT match "uuid".
get parameter uuid ok
get parameter session_id ok
get parameter session_steps ok

This example takes the list "session_steps" and extracts the next item after "audioas2" from that list which will be "peabodyas". That value is then placed into the "session_next_step" metadata field.
The resulting value in "session_next_step" will later be used to redirect the user to that next experiment after this one is complete.
We also put the hypothetical name of this experiment "audioas2" into "session_step" for convenience.

transmitResults.dataLogFormat: Is this UUID for this session step valid? Please respond with a 200 if it is and provide either validated_uuid or a variable validation_error if you want a human readable message to be shown. Otherwise a non 200 / error code will just prevent the user proceding.

htmlText.featureText: Transmitting the data for this session step failed.
Transmitting the data for this session step ok
The the return value validated_uuid from transmitResults matches the provided uuid.
The the return value validated_uuid from transmitResults does NOT match the provided uuid.
The session_steps value is incorrect, please provide it exactly as described below and reload this page.
The get parameter session_steps is a _ separated list and should contain the value "audiosimplereactiontime_lilbq4_audioas2_peabodyas_audiononwordmonitoring_grammaras_visualsimplereactiontime".

session_id must be between 0 - 6.
Please provide this as a URL GET parameter and reload this page.

uuid has not been found.
Please provide this as a URL GET parameter and reload this page.
get parameter session_steps NOT provided
get parameter session_id NOT provided
get parameter uuid NOT provided

htmlText.featureText: Your efforts have proved adequate.

The endpoint for this data transmition is set in the listing.json file section for this experiment with the values registrationUrlStaging and registrationUrlProduction.
Results transmition failed.
Results transmitted ok.

plainText.featureText: Could not contact the server, please check your internet connection and try again.

htmlText.featureText: This is the end of the experiment.

htmlTokenText.featureText:
Thank you for your participation!
Please use this link to return to the MPI website and register your efforts: register your efforts.

htmlText.featureText: It is worth noting that both Prolific and Mechanical Turk do not use return values from the experiment software. Instead they take a single experiment code which is the same for all users and require the user to log in to their website by following that link.

plainText.featureText: Could not contact the server, please check your internet connection and try again.
You must delete the local data to proceed.

htmlText.featureText: Listen to the recorded audio and click the button that corresponds to the recording.
Your efforts have proved adequate.
Your efforts have proved inadequate.

The tag activateRandomItem will take the list of menu items on this screen and randomly select one that has not been completed and send the user to that screen. If all have been completed then the user will be sent to this screen's next presenter.
The participants which are still in local browser memory:
Einde van deze test.
Bedankt voor uw deelname.
